SEARCH
Package battleship.model

Klasse Grid

java.lang.Object
battleship.model.Grid
public class Grid extends Object
Represents the game grid with cells arranged in rows and columns. Provides methods to access cells and retrieve the grid position.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Grid

      Grid(int rows, int cols)
      Constructs a new grid with the specified number of rows and columns.
      Parameter:
      rows - The number of rows in the grid.
      cols - The number of columns in the grid.

  • Methodendetails

    • getField

      public Cell getField(char y, int x)
      Gets the cell at the specified position in the grid.
      Parameter:
      y - The vertical position.
      x - The horizontal position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The cell at the specified position.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Gets the position of the grid.
      Gibt zurück:
      The position of the grid.

    • getAbc

      public char[] getAbc()
      Gets the array of characters representing the vertical positions on the grid.
      Gibt zurück:
      The array of characters representing vertical positions.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the grid to a string for display purposes.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      A string representation of the grid.
